text.div:
Override Type

CodeDescriptionCommentVersion
EQV Equivalence OverrideIdentifies an override where a service is being performed against an order that the system does not recognize as equivalent to the ordered service.added v2.5
EXTN Extension OverrideIdentifies an override where a service is being performed for longer than the ordered period of time.added v2.5
INLV Interval OverrideIdentifies an override where a repetition of service is being performed sooner than the ordered frequency.added v2.5

name: v2.0518
title: v2 Override type
description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0518 ( Override type)
